    • setGods

      public void setGods​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> gods, int socketId)
      This method sets the Gods chosen by the eldest player, that will be used in the Game.
      Parameters:
      gods - arraylist that contains gods chosen by eldest player
      socketId - id of the eldest player

      Method called when a player end his turn
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when the game can't be saved correctly

    • addWorker

      public void addWorker​(Player p, int x, int y, int socketId) throws java.io.IOException
      This method adds a new player's worker in a certain position on the board .
      Parameters:
      p - player
      x - x coordinate where a worker is placed
      y - y coordinate where a worker is placed
      socketId - id of the player
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker​(Player player, int xStart, int yStart, int xDest, int yDest, int socketId)
      This method moves a player's worker in a certain position.
      Parameters:
      player -
      xStart - starting x coordinate of the worker
      yStart - starting y coordinate of the worker
      xDest - final x coordinate of the worker
      yDest - final y coordinate of the worker
      socketId - id of the player

    • build

      public void build​(Player player, int xStart, int yStart, int xDest, int yDest, int level, int socketId)
      This method builds a new level inside a certain cell of the game board
      Parameters:
      player -
      xStart - x coordinate of the worker that builds
      yStart - y coordinate of the worker that builds
      xDest - x coordinate where a worker builds
      yDest - y coordinate where a worker builds
      level - 1 if standard build, 2 if hephaestus build, 4 if atlas build
      socketId - id of the player

      public void setGod​(java.lang.String god, Player player, int socketId)
      lets the player chose his god card.
      Parameters:
      god - god chosen by the player
      player -
      socketId - id of the player
